body: @SilverLight: yep Hidemaru. But, it shouldn't come to you as a surprise, he's been drawing huge breasts for as long as I can remember. Anyway, I'm also interested in Saigado's new series, it's looking great. Next issue is up, see you there!
Pg 63 is Hidemaru right? Goddamn! Since when did they draw boobs that huge??
